name: Fluffy Pancakes
description: Soft, fluffy pancakes perfect for breakfast.
instructions: Mix dry ingredients together.
Add milk, egg, and butter; whisk until smooth.
Heat a pan and cook pancakes until golden brown.
Serve with syrup or fruits.

name: White Sauce Pasta
description: Creamy white sauce pasta loaded with veggies.
instructions: Boil pasta until cooked.
Make white sauce with milk and flour.
Mix pasta with sauce and serve.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Aromatic and flavorful Indian rice dish with spiced chicken.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 2 hours.
Cook onions until golden brown.
Layer chicken and rice, cook on low heat for 30 minutes.
Garnish and serve hot.

name: Chocolate Brownies
description: Rich and fudgy homemade chocolate brownies.
instructions: Melt butter and mix with cocoa powder and sugar.
Add eggs and vanilla, then fold in flour.
Bake at 180춿C (350춿F) for 25 minutes.
Let cool and cut into squares.

name: Spicy Nachos
description: Crispy nachos topped with melted cheese and jalape침os.
instructions: Spread chips on a baking tray.
Sprinkle cheese and jalape침os on top.
Bake at 180춿C (350춿F) for 10 minutes.
Serve with salsa and sour cream.

name: Mint Mojito
description: A refreshing Cuban cocktail with lime, mint, and soda.
instructions: Muddle mint leaves and lime.
Add sugar and muddle again.
Fill glass with ice.
Pour rum, top with soda, stir.

name: Blue Lagoon
description: A vibrant blue cocktail made with vodka and lemonade.
instructions: Fill glass with ice cubes.
Pour vodka and blue cura칞ao.
Top with lemonade and stir.
Garnish with lemon and cherry.

name: Soft Idli
description: Steamed South Indian rice cakes, light and fluffy.
instructions: Soak rice and dal separately for 6 hours.
Grind to a smooth batter and ferment overnight.
Pour batter into idli molds and steam for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with coconut chutney and sambar.

name: Crispy Masala Dosa
description: Crispy South Indian dosa filled with spiced potato stuffing.
instructions: Heat oil, add mustard seeds, onions, and spices.
Add mashed potatoes and mix well.
Spread dosa batter thinly on a hot pan.
Place the potato filling inside, fold and serve with chutney.

name: Traditional Sambar
description: A flavorful South Indian lentil stew with vegetables.
instructions: Pressure cook dal with turmeric until soft.
Add vegetables, sambar powder, and tamarind extract.
In a pan, temper mustard seeds and red chilies.
Mix with cooked sambar and serve with rice.

name: Chettinad Chicken Curry
description: A fiery and aromatic South Indian chicken curry.
instructions: Marinate chicken with turmeric and salt.
Saut칠 onions, add ginger-garlic paste and masala.
Add chicken and cook for 25 minutes.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with rice.

name: Mango Payasam
description: A sweet and creamy South Indian dessert with mango.
instructions: Cook rice in milk until soft.
Add mango puree, sugar, and cardamom powder.
Simmer for 5 minutes, then drizzle ghee on top.
Serve warm or chilled.

name: Kerala Banana Chips
description: Crispy and golden banana chips fried in coconut oil.
instructions: Peel and slice bananas thinly.
Mix with turmeric and salt.
Heat coconut oil and fry slices until crisp.
Drain excess oil and serve.

name: South Indian Filter Coffee
description: Aromatic and strong South Indian filter coffee.
instructions: Brew coffee in a filter using hot water.
Boil milk and mix with brewed coffee.
Add sugar to taste and froth the coffee by pouring back and forth.
Serve hot in a traditional tumbler.
